segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have Chinese medicine here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes.we have herb medicine and ready-made medicine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I have this prescription filled here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , sir . The angelica is out of stock now .
segments.speaker: S1
